meta.title: Step by Step with the QC Team

company_name_rules: Do not write all uppercase except 'L.L.C'
contacts: Primary manager info from MEF; YES-YES

UAE: Validate bank code via Bank Codes sheet
KSA: Validate bank code via Bank Codes sheet
JOR: Validate bank code via Bank Codes sheet

UAE: Address: from VAT certificate; if missing, TL; if missing, MEF
Ensure city and country at end
TRN from VAT; if not tax‑registered, use license number from TL
KSA: Address: from CR; if 'مركزها الرئيسي' has city/district only, take full address from 'العنوان' and append the city/district
TRN from VAT; if not tax‑registered, use license from CR

brand: KSA format: 'KSA - Brand Name' | CK: '(CK)' | Food Truck: '(FT)'

naming_and_language: English outlet name from MIF; verify spelling via logo if provided
Find Arabic name via Logo, Website (Arabic version), Social Media or competitors; otherwise transliterate (e.g., 'موفينبيك اّيس كريم')
tags_and_cuisines: Tags must match partner menu and guidelines (see Tags SOP)
Add 'New restaurant' for all new onboardings
JOR: add 'Only on Careem' for exclusive contracts
Cannot add cuisines from different trees
Tags can come from different trees if related to chosen cuisines and menu items
Geographical and non‑geographical cuisines can’t be mixed unless the non‑geo is a valid general tag within the same category
Subpage Tags are hidden sorting tags for subpages/subtiles
timings_and_delivery: Discovery radius: UAE per zone (zonal sheet); KSA: 8000 (Riyadh)/10000 (Jeddah); JOR: 5000 (Irbid), 7000 (Amman), 9000 (Plan A + exclusives), 7500 (Plan B), 6500 (Plan C)
Delivery charge: UAE AED 7; KSA SAR 15; JOR JOD 1 (Irbid) / JOD 2 (Amman)
Price per person = average of [highest-priced main + dessert + drink] / 3
Tax registered 'Yes' only if VAT certificate attached
Tax on commission: UAE 5%, KSA 15%, JOR 16%
Outlet type per JIRA ticket: Regular (Careem fulfillment) or Cash paid at POS (Self-delivery)
Target acceptance time: 90s (UAE CF), 120s (KSA/JOR CF), 1800s (Merchant fulfillment)

address: If in a mall: add mall name to 'Restricted Zone Name + Full Address' and gate number if available
Add 'Zones extension' per zones extensions sheet; set 'zonal enabled' = Yes
contact_details: Primary outlet manager: Deliveries Yes, Finance Yes
Finance contact: Deliveries No, Finance Yes
KSA: finance email added to both company and outlet
operational_hours: If operating past midnight, add an extra slot to the next day (e.g., Thu 13:30–02:00 → add Fri 00:00–02:00)

login_credentials.requirement: Create 2 sets of credentials per new outlet: operations + owner
owner_accounts: New brand & company: new owner account. Login ID: company name without spaces + 'soa@careemnow.com'
Existing companies with new banking: create new company ID; follow same format but add sequence number
Outlet extensions: link new outlet to the existing owner account (see copy-from-outlet)
For very long company names: do not use full name in login

catalogue.categories_ordering: Arrange categories as per internal guidelines
writing_tips: Do not copy-paste blindly (avoid spelling/translation mistakes)
If not in glossary, research common/formal writing
Avoid extra spaces; maintain consistent style; double check work

group_options_types.use: Mandatory single choice (e.g., sizes/flavors where exactly one is required)
Extras with no limit; customer may choose none (e.g., Remove options; extras with charge)
Limited multi-select; free to add some but not all
Choose more than one up to a max or allow duplicates (e.g., multiple ice cream flavors)

quality_scores.repetition_rule: Accountable for up to 10 repetitions of the same mistake
